column4: Hi, anyone know anything about tunneling X-windows apps through an ssh session?
ssh and that feature is documented all over the place. :) in short.. ssh -X you.remote.machine   , then run the app.
or ssh -Y,  assuming the enable x forearding is allowed for the server.
Thanks, I got xming server working using putty (plink) to ssh to my home machine and get me back an xterm
